org.apache.flink.orc

类 OrcTableSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.orc.OrcTableSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.table.sources.BatchTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.FilterableTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.ProjectableTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.TableSource<Row>

    public class OrcTableSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.flink.table.sources.BatchTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.ProjectableTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.FilterableTableSource<Row>
    A TableSource to read ORC files.

    The OrcTableSource supports projection and filter push-down.

    An OrcTableSource is used as shown in the example below. 

     
 OrcTableSource orcSrc = OrcTableSource.builder()
   .path("file:///my/data/file.orc")
   .forOrcSchema("struct<col1:boolean,col2:tinyint,col3:smallint,col4:int>")
   .build();

 tEnv.registerTableSource("orcTable", orcSrc);
 Table res = tableEnv.sql("SELECT * FROM orcTable");

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OrcTableSource

        private OrcTableSource(java.lang.String path,
                       org.apache.orc.TypeDescription orcSchema,
                       Configuration orcConfig,
                       int batchSize,
                       boolean recursiveEnumeration)
        Creates an OrcTableSouce from an ORC TypeDescription.
        参数:
        path - The path to read the ORC files from.
        orcSchema - The schema of the ORC files as TypeDescription.
        orcConfig - The configuration to read the ORC files.
        batchSize - The number of Rows to read in a batch, default is 1000.
        recursiveEnumeration - Flag whether the path should be recursively enumerated or not.

      • OrcTableSource

        private OrcTableSource(java.lang.String path,

                       Configuration orcConfig,
